content: This app does a good job, and at $4 CAD the 'pro' version is most affordable. On par with the elegant app is fantastic customer service. I thought I had a problem with one of the features, so I wrote about it, and in 24 hours the problem was no more, thanks to said good service ;) ... and I learned something about my device at the same time! Thanks!
replyContent:
Thanks for your feedback!
What exactly happens when you try to open the floating window on your tablet? What is the model and Android version of your tablet? It'd be great if you could also send me screenshots. Thanks!
ayman.elakwah@gmail.com

content: The software is easy to use and functions very well on my Samsung Galaxy tab S2. I had some questions regarding a compatible remote and emailed the developer directly. He responded within the hour and gave me some excellent suggestions. I highly recommend the pro version of this software as a cost effective solution to anyone looking for an easy to use teleprompter.
I use this app with a Glide Gear 100 and Samsung tablet every week. It's been a great help in improving my presentation quality.

I love this app because I can easily import .txt files and then connect a cheap Bluetooth mini keyboard to control the speed and direction of the text. Works perfectly on my galaxy s9 plus. Nice job devs!
Easy to use. Just what I needed. I upgraded to pro to get the transparent verlay script . It was good value at 2.99
The best app for Video and Audio Recording. You can read the news just like TV anchor.
Just right

I just purchased the Pro plan and trying to add scripts from Google Drive. I didn't see where to send a question so hoping you answer it here. It shows most everything as grayed out, so not able to add the script. I have a Galazy Note 10. Can you help? If I can't add scripts, it would not be worth my time to pursue farther. Thank you. Added after email reply: Appreciate the reply and suggestions - for me, it was more steps than I'd like to take. So, I can't really comment on the functioning of the app as I didn't pursue it further.
replyContent: I've responded to your email. You need to make sure that the extensions of the files you're trying to import are either .txt or .docx

content: Greate app
The best teleprompter app

Not bad. However, I would prefer to start/stop using my Bluetooth clicker (I usually used the clicker to start/stop video recording, but now I use teleprompter without recording on this device). I also thought it would be wonderful if the app could start/stop with video recording (as an option).

Fantastic app! I have done professional video production since the 1980's, and this app is as good as any software I have ever used . I bought a bluetooth keyboard and have a 3rd person control the prompting speed from off camera. Works flawlessly. Thanks for creating such a professional app!
This app is fantastic and made my videos 10x better. Simple to use and is backed by excellent customer service if you have any questions.
easy to use and worked well

Very elegant indeed! This app does exactly what I need on a Note 8. Has a very flexible and easy to use interface and operation. Prompt response from developer about using a remote. Definitely worth the Pro version. Thank you for developing it.
Works as intended! Just be careful with your phones proximity to the mic as the mic can and will pick up the radio frequency... I also had the mic and phone way to close so .. user error .

This is an excellent teleprompter app. Its ability to import text including Word documents is a big plus saving me time and trouble. The ability to control the speed of the playback and pause if needed has been implemented perfectly. I give this app my highest recommendation.
I'm struggling to get script over to the app.. Haven't used in a while so might be missing something. Please help.

Have been using for a while, love it and buy pro. One request, using same account I install it on two phones and I need to sync automatically between them. Please add function to sync between devices using the same account using free drive like google drive or dropbox.
Great product

[Edited] After getting the response and looking into it, indeed the problem is on the Play side (Google! Ts, ts, ts!)... Had a good experience with the app, so decided to support the author and buy the PRO. For my surprise, unlike many other app I have, it only works on 1 of my devices. And I use the app on my phone AND my tablet (under the same Google account of course).
replyContent: I have just replied to your email. You should be able to install it on multiple devices. Sometimes, there are problems with the Google Play Store app. I've sent you a link to a similar question on a Google support page. The page includes instructions to help you solve the problem.

content: Wonderful app... Easy to use. Never gave me hard time. Highly recommended
Very useful!
I like and use this regularly in preaching. I find it fits my needs well. I would like it to accept odt files and preserve formatting. Otherwise excellent.
Bi rastî gelek baş e. Destxweş. Very very good. Best...
Works as it's supposed to.

Love this app but the editing controls need work. I am a user of this over several other teleprompters. Just think that the builders don't do too much screen work themselves. The editing on the fly is always weak.
Does exactly as promised... Very simple to use with great user interface...
Does everything I need - flawlessly.

This app greatly simplified my recording work. It will help you speak more naturally and diminish your number of do-overs. Occasionally the program closes in the middle of a recording session. Especially if I've stopped and restarted several times. But ... this could be a hardware issue with my phone since I'm running video at the same time. Overall a clean, intuitive, program that does exactly what it should. Thanks!
replyContent: Thanks for your feedback. This is a common problem on Xiaomi devices. Xiaomi kills background apps for battery optimization. You need to disable battery optimization for this application. Check this link: dontkillmyapp.com/xiaomi

content: very nice, simple to app that lets me do exactly what I need to for video training
Great app. Easy to use.
Works perfect for me!

Excellent app. But I am not able to install the paid version (Pro) on another device using the same Google account without paying again. Please help resolve the issue because I think you deserve a 5 star. Thanks.
replyContent: Please contact me. I'd be glad to help. ayman.elakwah@gmail.com

content: This an excellent app. The format and words show very well.

Please help: how can I have the floating screen full size on my phone whilst recording from the same phone? At the moment I can record and read but the teleprompter is small at the centre if that makes sense. Otherwise I am very happy with the app is fabulous and will give it a 🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟 thank you! Patrizia 🙂
replyContent: Hello Patrizia, I'm really glad you like Elegant Teleprompter. To resize the floating window, just hold and move the arrow at bottom-right corner of the window. To move the floating window, drag the top panel. You might need to tap once on the text so that these elements appear. ayman.elakwah@gmail.com

content: Easy to use! The Pro has all the basics needed to utilize the app. You can even transfer copy from other files!
Does everything I need it to do
Works really well, one request, the screen stays on while scrolling but turns off if paused. Could there be an option to keep the screen on when paused?
Does exactly as explained. I've used it to give talks about Jehovah on Zoom. It needs more import options and text editing options like bold, underline, highlight...
Mu scripts aren't pulling through from the free version....appreciate the developer reply though....the design should have an automatic pull through without needing to back up separately.
replyContent: You need to backup your scripts from the free version and then restore them back in the pro version. Go to Settings > Backup and Restore. Select a backup folder and then backup your scripts. In the pro version, go to Settings > Backup and Restore. Select the same backup folder and then restore scripts. ayman.elakwah@gmail.com

content: I would have given this five stars, except for a serious defect. I timed a speech at 10 minutes, yet somehow when I delivered it sped up without warning, to 5 minutes!! Users need the ability to lock the playback speed until it is unlocked.
replyContent: Speed changes only upon an action from user unless there is a bug I'm not aware of. Make sure that the buttons assigned to change speed are not accidentally pressed. Duration can also change by changing device orientation, text width, etc. You might need to fix device orientation. Please provide me with more details: ayman.elakwah@gmail.com

content: Great just what I've been looking for! Pro version well worth the price. Thank you.
Excellen app!! it works as they said. Very flexible, editable and can be used with any camera app..Very impressive😊👍
Perfect tool.
It didn't work for me. Videos kept stopping every 4 seconds
replyContent: Do you use the app in the floating window mode or the full screen mode? What do you mean that the video kept stopping? Does that mean that the floating window kept closing? Please contact me: ayman.elakwah@gmail.com

content: I had to remove the guide rules for the phone as I am now using a Galaxy S8 which is too large. But I am using it in a home studio so no problem. David

Works smoothly and the dev answers questions. RTL works great, DOCX works no problems. I just have one request for improvement: When 'Tap to Play/Pause' setting is activated, tapping brings up the GUI elements at the top and bottom of the screen, which is distracting when you're live. I wish there were an option where a single tap just pauses the text without showing any GUI elements, and another tap gets it rolling again. A double tap or a long tap can be used if the user wishes to show the GUI elements. This way the text can be frozen momentarily without distractions giving the user full control to sync displayed text with speech. I'm using the app with a Bluetooth mouse and a teleprompter, and this is the only issue I'v had so far.
Great, fast, accurate
Great solution!
Was looking for a simple script app and this fit my need as a mobile DJ, I don't have to purchase a tablet. My phone is big enough to get the job done. Thank you and I highly recommend it. 💯👍🏾

No need of any fancy teleprompter device or camera. This does the job. Resize teleprompter window on top of screen and start recording using smartphone. It will stay on top of screen and u can record simultaneously. There are many settings for ur customisation. Must buy. You will thank me!!
Amazing tool...and so simple!

I purchased this app - the upgraded version several months ago, now it has disappeared from my phone and it seems I have to purchase it again. I thought I had purchased the use of this app indefinitely. If this isn't the case, you should be up front about it because now I'm feeling scammed. I like this app otherwise, but I'm only giving 3 stars because the app has disappeared.
replyContent: Yes, you have purchased the use of this app indefinitely. Please make sure you are using the same account you used to purchased the app. Sometimes, there are problems in Play Store app. Please contact me, I would be happy to help you install the app again. ayman.elakwah@gmail.com

content: Best Teleprompter!!!

This one simply works. Smooth scrolling, no jitter, customizable bluetooth remote buttons, and such a simple thing as scroll bar that some other apps lack which makes scrolling large texts a pain. And simply having a mirror-mode toggle switch on the main page is very handy for previewing. I have two requests for future versions, please. 1. Add font customization, the default one is a bit too thick for my liking. 2. Add option to scroll continuously as long as the scroll button on a remote is pressed at some adjustable speed.
replyContent: Thanks for your feedback. I'm really glad that you like Elegant Teleprompter. Thanks for your suggestions. These will be in the future plan of Elegant Teleprompter.

content: Excellent!

Minus one star for the annoying popup asking me to rate an app I've already rated and interrupting my work flow! Especially bad since I actually paid for this app. FIX this! Upgraded from basic! Simple and easy to use. Does exactly what it says it does and does it really, really well. Used the free version several weeks and glad I upgraded.
replyContent: Sorry for inconvenience. You can tap "No, thanks" when it asks you to rate the app and it should never show up again.

content: Good one, however text modifying features are less. Is there a way to change the color and size of individual line/word, i dont think so. Can you add it? It will be very helpful feature.
Awesome app! I love it! Super easy to use, flexible and you can't tell I'm reading from a teleprompter. Love the floating window feature.
Simple & easy to use. Love it!
This works great for my small studio.
sir pleas decrease line spacing 0.25 or 0.50 if u can thank you ...sir for awosome app love your work sir...👌👍
replyContent:
You can remove them by clicking once on the text. Just make sure that "Tap to Play/Pause" is disabled in Settings.

ayman.elakwah@gmail.com

content: Finally a teleprompter that works. I tried 5 different apps, and they all have one issue or another. This one is like a match made in heaven for solo content creators
I seriously believe it's one of the most amazing mobile application I have had the pleasure of using, I feel it was tailor made for my kind of use. It's just what the Doctor ordered for me.
great app, but, when I changed countries from U.S. to U.K. my Pro version somehow was deleted, and I lost hours worth of script writing and editing.
replyContent: Sorry for that. When the app is uninstalled, its data is removed unless there is a backup. You need to backup your scripts before uninstalling the app. You can find backup and restore options in Settings > Backup and Restore

content: Как я жила раньше без этого приложения!!!. Самый настоящий телесуфлер . Все просто, удобно, быстро! Особенно радует возможность использования во всплывающем окне при съемке фронтальной камерой. Идеально!!!
Newb here, but the app does everything I need for my videos. Great job!

App is good but importing files from Google Docs is unpleasant. Have to download as docx, then re-upload to Google Drive. Don't see why it can't be directly integrated with Docs. Would save a lot of time and hassle.
Very straightford and easy to use. Only some context assistance would improve it.
Great app, and after having small issues, developer corrected it in matter of hours. Big recommendation
Kindly add the feature of increase/decrease font by pinch to zoom on the teleprompter screen. I mean in the floating mode.
replyContent: Just click on the icon at the bottom-left corner of the screen. Then, you can pinch to increase/decrease font size

content: This is a great app so far. It works well with the remote as well. Thanks to the developer for his quick response I had when I was struggling to connect to the remote. The problem was quickly sorted with his unwavering support.
Excellent!!!

App is very functional! Additional Feature request 1. Kindly make the script editor a Rich text editor Purpose- It will allow creators to be able to highlight text, paragraphs or Bullet point into different colors or bolded font. This way we can have CUE text for diverse use during training. 2. I also would love to see where scripts can be broken into SLIDES OR PAGES Purpose- for easy adlibing and to allow for more flexibility to be natural during teaching or recording.
very useful. thanks for this app
Exactly what i needed for my YouTube tutorials
Works brilliantly. Perfect with a Bluetooth presenter to pause, skip forward and back and manage speed in real time.
Works very well for me.
Exactly what the doctor ordered. Works perfectly and training clients on the use of it is a snap.

Very easy to use. I wanted a clean, simple prompter app and this was just right. I was thrilled the first time I used it for a voice-over job--a perfect read the first time and no shuffling pages in my tiny booth!
Perfect for my home made teleprompter box! Does exactly what I need!!

I've been using this for a couple of weeks - it works as advertised QUESTION: why does it seem to take so long to connect to drive to load my files(s)?... problem solved with a refresh to DRIVE Thanks...
replyContent:
Actually, this depends on the internet connection and the Drive application itself.
Try updating Google Drive application if you don't have the latest version.

What exactly is the problem?
Please note that the supported file extensions are .txt and .docx
Please contact me: ayman.elakwah@gmail.com

content: By far my favorite teleprompter app. Much more options than the parrot teleprompter app in terms of customisation and with a remote, there is no need to to subscribe to more expensive voice activated apps. What I also like is that I can take the width all the way down so my eyes don't jump much left to right on camera

This is a great app. simple to use and very effective. I'm running it on a Fujitsu tablet and using a home made autocue screen in front of a basic video camera. The result is so much more professional as I am looking directly at the camera, instead of looking at a tablet offset from the camera. Using the ETP means I can produce my scripts on the laptop in word, transfer to my tablet via the Documents to go app and use directly to ETP. Easy intuitive app, would highly recommend it.
Works absolutely fantastic
I have been using this app for about a month and love it. It has the features I need from adjusting speed, font size, overlaying a camera app, remote control and more. Highly recommend.
Good app and very helpful support. Just needs a selfie background option and it's 5 stars.

I just bought the app. For some reason i cannot get it to work with my Samsung phone. Any ideas appreciated. The App was recommended by Selvi the app i was using previously that is no longer supported. I will be happy to change my rating if i can get it to work.
replyContent:
Could you please let me know what the problem exactly is? ayman.elakwah@gmail.com
Edit: I haven't received anything from you. You only left a bad review with no obvious reason.

content: Still no support for importing from Google Docs. And importing from Google Drive is just as inconvenient as not being able to import from Docs because you still have to download and save the document as .txt or .docx and upload to the Drive. Might as well just download from Docs on your phone and then save as .txt or .docx and then import using Elegant. Both ways are clunky and should've been streamlined by now.
replyContent:
Sorry for inconvenience. I totally agree with you. Cloud support and importing from Google Docs are very important. I just postponed working on this as it needs a lot of preparation. I will start working on that very soon. Please send me an email or edit your reply so I can notify you once this feature is available.
ayman.elakwah@gmail.com

content: I’m enjoying Elegant Teleprompter Pro very much. I’m a city council member in Kirkland, WA, USA, and our media team likes to have councilmembers appear in various videos the city publishes on Facebook and other sites. Having the teleprompter display right over the camera app on my phone makes that so simple!

WOW! What an incredible and easy to use piece of software. Literally within minutes I was able to import my document directly from Google Drive, setup a bluetooth remote button (originally for a camera) to start/stop the preview and edit the document in a fast and easy interface. All of the controls are super intuitive without having to fumble around to find them. Totally worth the cost as it just saved me hours of time.

Wonderful app! After watching the demo & reading the reviews, I decided to skip the ad version and purchase the pro version. So glad I did. The developer took the time to build an app which is user friendly, intuitive UI, operates in portrait or landscape, controls scroll speed, font color, changeable focus window size, import your script and more. Plus, I like seeing the many responses from the developer to reviewers having any questions or suggestions. If you need a teleprompter, this is it!

The app does exactly what it is intended to do and it does it well. If I could ask for anything, it would be a screen recording with optional audio. It would be nice to read and record scripts and then listen back to them.
Great app. Easy to use and very useful! I highly recommend this app. Best teleprompter ever!
The Elegant Teleprompter Pro is suits my needs. I find it very useful and the team is very willing to help. Thank you Ayman Elakwah. Good job. I would buy it even for 7 pounds!
replyContent:
No, you don't have to pay again to install it on your phone. Just make sure that you're using the same account you used to purchase the app on your tablet.
Please contact me if you still need any help.
ayman.elakwah@gmail.com

content: Without a doubt, The best App I have used! Superb!
Excellent app
Nice
Not bad app, but crashes all the time, whenever I'm using it for more than 15min
replyContent:
Could you give me more details please? Does it crash with an error message or just closes? If you use the application in overlay mode and the application closes by itself. This is because your device killed it for battery optimization. You can disable battery optimization for certain applications from device settings.
ayman.elakwah@gmail.com

content: Great app! My only suggestion is to allow for word wrap so longer words aren't hyphenated.

App is excellent! And so is their response - very fast and very helpful. They totally solved my problem. Yesterday's feedback: I would give it 5 stars if it didn't just close down and abort after about 10 minutes (when in overlay mode)
replyContent: Sorry for inconvenience. Xiaomi killing background apps for battery optimization seems to be a known issue. You can visit this website dontkillmyapp.com/xiaomi and follow instructions to disable battery optimization for certain apps. Please let me know whether this solved your problem.

content: Would like to be able to control pause/ play from a bluetooth keyboard. UPDATE: Developer responded with helpful tip immediately (within hours). I have changed my rating from 4 stars to 5 STARS! Thank you and God bless.
replyContent: You can control the application using a Bluetooth keyboard. After pairing the Bluetooth keyboard with your Android device, go to Settings - Remote Settings. Then, assign keys to actions.

content: Great app. Love being able to import Microsoft Office .docx files.
Simple and very useful for content creator, and the technical support are amazingly effective, fix the issue faster than my expectation. 👍👍👍👍👍
replyContent: Please update to the latest version. Bluetooth devices are now supported in floating mode. Just make sure that the floating window is in focus to receive key events. Its border is blue when it is in focus.

content: Great app!
It's a great app however if I have a script that I write in MS Word and save to Google drive I can not import? Please confirm how to get it or what type of file the app support? Thanks
replyContent:
Thanks for your feedback. You can import the script If is saved in ".docx" format(MS Default). However, you need to make sure that in Google Drive settings, "Convert uploaded files to Google Docs editor format" option is disabled.
Please contact me if you still need any help.
ayman.elakwah@gmail.com

content: Would give it a 5 star review if it had the capability of starting with a voice command. What Bluetooth remotes does this work with?

This is a great user-friendly app. I've used other Android based teleprompter apps & found this superior in it's ease of use. For example, importing files from apps like MSWord was very easy. I do recommend it.
Excelent
Great app. It said I could share it. How do you do that?

I love this app (just purchased) but could I make one small suggestion to make it even more wonderful? Can you please allow the order of the saved scripts to be changed manually? At the moment only the most recently added appears at the top but I am using this for live performance singing (lyrics) and I would like to arrange each song in set list to my liking. Is this possible? P.S. can you also add a setting that allows all scripts to have the "specific settings" checkbox enabled?
Doesn't load any of my files and also crashes
Simple, easy to use, and effective

I'd like to be able to move the focus position to be right over the lens without having to move the camera or glass. I suppose your Window feature could What's the best way to remote control the app? I see DPAD settings but unsure what that means. The app is great otherwise and works brilliantly every time.
replyContent:
Edit: You can now change focus position. While previewing script, hold and move the drag icon.
The current version doesn't have the option to change focus position. To remote control the app, you need a Bluetooth remote or a wireless keyboard. In the "Remote Settings" screen, you can tap on each icon, to assign a key.

content: Works great, easy to use and full functionality.

It doesn't work while the camera is recording!. That is the purpose of why I need it, use it in the phone and record at the same time 😓 UPDATE: Still not working, do not see how i can make it float, sorry 😓 UPDATE: Thanks, now I got to make it work! 🙌🏼, good job.
replyContent: Please update to the latest version. You can now use Elegant Teleprompter in a "Floating Window", which means you can use it simultaneously with any other app, including the camera app. Please re-review the app. Thanks!

content: I used a few other apps first, then I decided to pay the $3. I can't believe the difference in how the apps work. This app is excellent. It only took me a few minutes to figure it out. Well worth $3.
Ganz gut. Aber leider kein Import/Sync von/mit Google Docs möglich und wenn die App im Landscape Modus ist, dann werden bei mir die Texte aus der importierten .txt Datei nicht übernommen.
replyContent:
Syncing with Drive and importing from Google Docs will be added in the future. I think the Landscape issue is solved now. Let me know if the problem still exists.

content: Great easy to use program, thank you.

content: As a preacher I started using this app to help me keep my timing 'in check', maintain eye content with the congregation and to avoid losing my place in my written notes. I love it! It works GREAT for ministry. Best "paid" app and certainly a fantastic value for the money! Thanks so much!!!!
Very good app. You can manage the telepromter remotely using a bluetooth keyboard.
Solid telerompter app. I added some scripts. Pretty easy with copy/paste. One festure I'd love to have would be an export/import.

content: I'm using this app to make a living as a musician. The developer has come through with updates for requests that I've asked for. I have over 150 songs with lyrics (and more to add) that scroll elegantly on my Pixel Slate. I even use the app in a split screen. If you are looking for a teleprompter that's simple, clear, easy to use and works every time. This is the app.
Awsome easy to use Teleprompter App.
